pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, February 10, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

12:30 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will attend a meeting with the Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ Western Economic Solutions Taskforce.

Closed to media.

1:25 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will have a joint discussion with Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ Western Economic Solutions Taskforce and Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages, Mélanie Joly.

Renaissance Edmonton Airport Hotel
4236 36 St E

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.
